shared.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    bank (ResourceList): The Resource cards available to be distributed to the players., remainingDevCards (DevCardList): the dev cards available to be distributed to the players, chat (MessageList): All the chat messages., log (MessageList): All the log messages., map (Map), players (array[Player]), tradeOffer (TradeOffer, optional): The current trade offer, if there is one., turnTracker (TurnTracker): This tracks who's turn it is and what action's being done., version (index): The version of the model. This is incremented whenever anyone makes a move., winner (index): This is -1 when nobody's won yet. When they have, it's their order index [0-3]

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildCity(VertexLocation location, int playerIndex)
      Removes three ore and two wheat from this player's ResourceList Subtracts one city from players cities count Adds settlement to players settlement count (player.resourceList.buyCity();) Replace settlement located on the given VertexLocation with a city(Map.buildCity())
      void buildRoad(EdgeLocation location)
      Removes a brick and wood from the player building the road(player.resourceList.buyRoad();) and creates a road located at the given EdgeLocation (Map.buildRoad())
      void buildSettlement(EdgeLocation location, int playerIndex)
      Removes a brick, wood, sheep, and wheat from the player building the settlement(player.resourceList.buySettlement();) and creates a road located at the given EdgeLocation (Map.buildSettlment())
      boolean canBuildCity(VertexLocation location, int playerIndex)
      Checks if a player has a city, the resources to build this city and if it is in a valid location on the map.
      boolean canBuildRoad(EdgeLocation location)
      Checks if a player has a road, the resources to build this road, if it is in a valid location on the map, and if the player has a road left to play
      boolean canBuildSettlement(VertexLocation location, int playerIndex)
      Checks if a player has a settlement to build, the resources to build this settlement and if it is in a valid location on the map.
      Player getPlayer(int playerIndex) 
      static Model parseModel(java.lang.String json) 
      void receiveNewResources()
      Iterates through all of the settlements and cities in the map and gives each player the resources they deserve for the given role.

      • parseModel

        public static Model parseModel(java.lang.String json)
        Parameters:
        json - this will be the Json representation of the model returned from the server.
        Returns:
        a new Model class representation of the current model on the server.

        Parameters:
        playerIndex - this is the index of the player
        Returns:
        Player at the specified playerIndex

      • receiveNewResources

        public void receiveNewResources()
        Iterates through all of the settlements and cities in the map and gives each player the resources they deserve for the given role.

      • canBuildRoad

        public boolean canBuildRoad(EdgeLocation location)
                     throws InsufficentSupplies,
                            InvalidLocation
        Checks if a player has a road, the resources to build this road, if it is in a valid location on the map, and if the player has a road left to play
        Parameters:
        location - this is the location of the Road you would like to build playerIndex identifies the player who would like to build the road
        Returns:
        true if no exception is thrown
        Throws:
        InsufficentSupplies - if the player did not have enough resources or pieces
        InvalidLocation - if this is an invalid location for this player to play a road

      • buildRoad

        public void buildRoad(EdgeLocation location)
        Removes a brick and wood from the player building the road(player.resourceList.buyRoad();) and creates a road located at the given EdgeLocation (Map.buildRoad())
        Parameters:
        location - where the player is playing the road

      • canBuildSettlement

        public boolean canBuildSettlement(VertexLocation location,
                                  int playerIndex)
                           throws InsufficentSupplies,
                                  InvalidLocation
        Checks if a player has a settlement to build, the resources to build this settlement and if it is in a valid location on the map.
        Parameters:
        location - where the player would like to build the settlement
        playerIndex - identifies the player who would like to build this settlement
        Returns:
        true if no exception is thrown
        Throws:
        InsufficentSupplies - if the player did not have enough resources
        InvalidLocation - if this is an invalid location for this player to play a settlement

      • buildSettlement

        Parameters:
        location - where the player is playing the road
        playerIndex - is used to identify the player playing the road

      • buildCity

        public void buildCity(VertexLocation location,
                      int playerIndex)
        Removes three ore and two wheat from this player's ResourceList Subtracts one city from players cities count Adds settlement to players settlement count (player.resourceList.buyCity();) Replace settlement located on the given VertexLocation with a city(Map.buildCity())

        location - where the player would like to place a city
        playerIndex - used to identify the player building this settlement
